BNC User Reference Guide

<trunc>

trunc contains one or more truncated words in transcribed speech.
Class model.divPart.spoken
Declaration 
element trunc { ( w | mw | gap | unclear )+ }
Attributes
(Global attributes only)
Example
 <s n="1377"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <trunc>
   <w c5="UNC" hw="the" pos="UNC">The </w>
  </trunc>
  <c c5="PUN">, </c>
  <w c5="AV0" hw="then" pos="ADV">then </w>
  <w c5="PNP" hw="he" pos="PRON">he </w>
  <trunc>
   <w c5="UNC" hw="bo" pos="UNC">bo </w>
  </trunc>
  <w c5="VVD" hw="bowl" pos="VERB">bowled </w>
 </s>
Module module-from-bncxml
